alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 5:16PM MST until December 26 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West wind 25 to 35 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph. Isolated snow showers could cause reduced visibility and slick winter travel. * WHERE...Rock Springs, Green River, and East Sweetwater County. This includes much of I-80 in southern Wyoming. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Visibility could be reduced due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use caution and be prepared for sudden crosswinds if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River
